name: Burger Wars
description:
You are Samfoosh, the burger. Bring the fast food industry to its knees. Traverse 5 levels, facing enemies and bosses alike. Oh, and try not to die. Much.

Play my other games: Navigator - Be America - Become Business

Visit www.snuffysam.com for news posts and beta demos of upcoming games like this one!

Visit www.snuffysam.bandcamp.com for the soundtrack!
